name: Genesis Tree
description:
The world was attacked, but we found a way to sustain life. A barrier built around the Genesis Tree. But in so building it we created a time loop. All of our world is lost inside this loop, forever bound to three moments in time.

W,A,S,D to move. R to reset.  Space to jump.

Find the portal to move between the moments of time. 

Music in the background from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Currently the game works better as a download. The browser game isn't optimized yet.
